<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Blood Frenzy](/Feats.aspx?ID=2909) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Eidolon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=386" />
<trait label="Evolution" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=394" />
<trait label="Summoner" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=392" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 69 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Bloodletting Claws](/Feats.aspx?ID=2900)

**Requirements**
Your eidolon's last action dealt bleed damage to a living creature.

</column>

---

Your eidolon flies into a frenzy. It gains the benefits of [_boost eidolon_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1045) and gains temporary HP equal to your level, but takes a –2 penalty to AC. It can't voluntarily end the frenzy or start another frenzy while in the frenzy. The frenzy lasts for 1 minute, after which your eidolon is [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15) for 1 minute and can't start another frenzy for 1 minute.
name: Blood Frenzy
requirement: Your eidolon's last action dealt bleed damage to a living creature.
